about_the_game:
Enter the Bomb-Filled Arena of Bombergrounds: Classic!
Prepare for explosive, fast-paced action where every battle is packed with chaos! Whether you’re playing solo or teaming up with friends, the battlefield is yours to conquer in this wild, adrenaline-pumping experience inspired by classic battle games. Do you have what it takes to dominate the competition?

Key Features:
  • Play Solo or With Friends: Whether you prefer to go it alone or team up with your friends, Bombergrounds has you covered. Show off your skills in both modes!
  • League Progression: Keep winning, collect trophies, and show off your hard-earned rewards.
  • Leaderboards: Compete against the best—locally and globally. Will you rise as a predator or fall as prey?
  • Skins and Swag: Customize your character with the coolest skins. Stand out from the crowd and let your style shine on the battlefield.

Jump into the explosive world of online multiplayer battle royale chaos. With cute and colorful designs, unlock tons of cosmetics and emotes, and experience the thrill of fast-paced combat.

Bombergrounds: Classic isn’t just a game—it’s a bombastic, laugh-out-loud arena where only the sharpest players survive. Are you ready to rule the battleground?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Bombergrounds: Classic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bombergrounds Classic: Blast your way through action-packed multiplayer mayhem! Drop bombs, swing bats, and outsmart your opponents to rise to the top in this nostalgic arena battle experience. Join the chaos and claim victory!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Indonesian, Japanese, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish
